import React from 'react'; import { Container, Typography, Paper, Stack, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Box, Button, } from '@mui/material'; import CheckIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Check'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { calculateGoldMonthlyPricing } from '../utils/calculateGoldPricing'; const formatCurrency = (amount) => amount == null ? 'N/A' : `$${amount.toLocaleString(undefined, { minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2 })}`; const CheckMark = () => ; const NotIncluded = () => ( not included ); export default function Pricing() { const questionsPricing = useSelector((state) => state.responses?.questionsPricing || 0); const serviceCatalogPricing = useSelector((state) => state.responses?.serviceCatalogPricing || 0); const questionResponses = useSelector((state) => state.responses || {}); const bronzeMonthly = questionsPricing; const silverMonthly = questionsPricing + serviceCatalogPricing; const goldMonthly = calculateGoldMonthlyPricing(); // Check if tax services are included (based on q6, q16, q17) const hasTaxServices = (questionResponses.q6 && questionResponses.q6 !== 'no') || (questionResponses.q16 && questionResponses.q16 !== 'no') || (questionResponses.q17 && questionResponses.q17 !== 'no'); // Check if corporate secretarial services are included (based on q26) const hasCorporateSecretarial = questionResponses.q26 && questionResponses.q26 !== 'no'; // Compliance is ticked only if tax services values are actually used in pricing const complianceBronze = hasTaxServices && questionsPricing > 0 ? : ; const complianceSilver = hasTaxServices && questionsPricing > 0 ? : ; const complianceGold = ; // Gold always includes all services const corporateSecretarialBronze = hasCorporateSecretarial ? : ; const corporateSecretarialSilver = hasCorporateSecretarial ? : ; const corporateSecretarialGold = ; // Gold always includes all services const pricingRows = [ { feature: 'Compliance\nTax returns done right and lodged on time', bronze: complianceBronze, silver: complianceSilver, gold: complianceGold, }, { feature: 'Company Secretarial', bronze: corporateSecretarialBronze, silver: corporateSecretarialSilver, gold: corporateSecretarialGold, }, { feature: 'Financial Reports\nAnnual financial statements for preparing tax returns and use with external parties like banks.', bronze: , silver: , gold: , }, { feature: 'Tax Planning\nAnnual estimating and planning for tax minimisation', bronze: , silver: , gold: , }, { feature: 'Reporting\nWatch the numbers and know what\'s going on.', bronze: , silver: Quarterly, gold: Monthly, }, { feature: 'Business Meetings\nTalk about the numbers, understand the numbers or make smart decisions', bronze: , silver: Quarterly, gold: Monthly, }, { feature: 'Access and Support\nAsk us any time any questions we are here to partner with you', bronze: ( Email the team
within 48 hr response ), silver: ( Email and phone team
within 24 hr response ), gold: ( Principal and team
same day ), }, ]; return ( Pricing Plans Choose the right plan for your accounting needs Packages Bronze Compliance sorted Silver Compliance and know what's going on Gold Achieve results via expert advice {pricingRows.map((row, index) => ( {row.feature} {row.bronze} {row.silver} {row.gold} ))} Price {bronzeMonthly > 0 ? formatCurrency(bronzeMonthly) : '$197'} {silverMonthly > 0 ? formatCurrency(silverMonthly) : '$397'} {formatCurrency(goldMonthly)}
{/* Info Section */} How Our Pricing Works Bronze Plan: Compliance sorted - includes tax returns, company secretarial, and financial reports with email support. Silver Plan: Compliance and know what's going on - adds tax planning, quarterly reporting and meetings, with phone support. Gold Plan: Achieve results via expert advice - includes everything plus principal access, same-day support, and monthly meetings and reporting. Note: Prices shown are monthly recurring charges. Additional one-time setup and advisory fees may apply based on your specific requirements. {/* CTA Section */} ); }
